message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave 10% for you. We can negotiate further if you're not satisfied.
Your offer was quite imbalanced. Let's be more reasonable: I'll take 60%, you take 40%.
Your offer was a bit too generous. I think it's more fair if we split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share this time.  Let's make a deal.
We're wasting time, and the money is losing value. I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a fair deal considering the time pressure.
